io.github.squid233.squidcraft.api

类 ItemsRegister

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.squid233.squidcraft.api.ItemsRegister
  • 已过时。 
    Please use Registers

    @Deprecated
public class ItemsRegister
extends java.lang.Object
    items register api → (item, tool and armor) register.

    • 方法详细资料

      • registerItem

        public static void registerItem(java.lang.String modid,
                                java.lang.String itemName,
                                net.minecraft.item.Item item)
        已过时。 Please use Registers.register(String, String, Item)

        add info () → message debug register logger.

        参数:
        modid - Mod identifier.
        itemName - Item name.
        item - Item.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.1.0

      • registerArmor

        public static void registerArmor(java.lang.String modid,
                                 java.lang.String armorName,
                                 net.minecraft.item.Item helmet,
                                 net.minecraft.item.Item chestplate,
                                 net.minecraft.item.Item leggings,
                                 net.minecraft.item.Item boots)
        已过时。 

        This method can register armor.

        add info() → message debug register armor register

        NOTE: This method its parameter is too many!

        参数:
        modid - Mod identifier.
        armorName - Armor's prefix. e.g. squid, they will be auto add "_helmet", "_chestplate", "_leggings" and "_boots", then your armor item name are "squid_helmet", "squid_chestplate", "squid_leggings" and "squid_boots".
        helmet - Helmet item.
        chestplate - Chestplate item.
        leggings - Leggings item.
        boots - Boots item.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.5.0

      • registerTool

        public static void registerTool(java.lang.String modid,
                                java.lang.String toolName,
                                net.minecraft.item.Item axe,
                                net.minecraft.item.Item hoe)
        已过时。 

        This method can register axe and hoe.

        参数:
        modid - Mod identifier.
        toolName - Tool's prefix. e.g. squid, they will be auto add "_axe" and "_hoe", then your tool item name are "squid_axe" and "squid_hoe".
        axe - Axe item.
        hoe - Hoe item.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.5.0

      • registerTool

        public static void registerTool(java.lang.String modid,
                                java.lang.String toolName,
                                net.minecraft.item.Item pickaxe,
                                net.minecraft.item.Item shovel,
                                net.minecraft.item.Item sword)
        已过时。 

        This method can register axe, hoe, pickaxe, shovel and sword.

        参数:
        modid - Mod identifier.
        toolName - Tool's prefix. e.g. squid, they will be auto add "_pickaxe", "_shovel" and "_sword", then your tool item name are "squid_pickaxe", "squid_shovel" and "squid_sword".
        pickaxe - Pickaxe item.
        shovel - Shovel item.
        sword - Sword item.
        从以下版本开始:
        0.5.0

      • registerAll

        public static void registerAll(java.lang.String modid,
                               java.lang.String[] itemNames,
                               net.minecraft.item.Item[] items)
        已过时。
